data.title: Carla Marschall
data.meta_description: Director of Teaching and Learning, United World College South East Asia
data.text: Carla Marschall is an experienced educator and international school leader, currently serving as the Director of Dresden International School. She is the co-author of two books, Concept-Based Inquiry in Action (2018) and Worldwise Learning: A Teacherâ€™s Guide to Shaping a Just, Sustainable Future (2022) which focus on concept-based learning and issues-based learning across the K-12 continuum. Carla has held other school leadership roles in Switzerland, Hong Kong, and Germany and served as a classroom teacher both in the United States and Germany.
